dcterms:description: The dataset covers 1,000 categories from ILSVRC2012 and is divided into 389 base categories and 611 novel categories where 193 base categories and 300 novel categories are used for cross-validation and the remaining 196 categories and 311 novel categories are used for testing. Each base category has about 1,280 training images and 50 test images.
dcterms:title: ImageNet-FS

dcterms:description: The dataset covers 6,000 categories, including 1,000 categories from ImageNet 2012 dataset as base categories and 5,000 novel categories selected from ImageNet 2011. It contains 50 test samples for each category, with 2,500 categories used for validation and the remaining 2,500 for final evaluation.
dcterms:title: ImageNet-6K

dcterms:creator: H. Jhuang
J. Gall
S. ZufÔ¨Å
C. Schmid
M. J. Black
dcterms:description: A dataset used for few-shot learning, containing 64 base categories, 16 validation categories, and 20 novel categories.
dcterms:title: miniImageNet

dcterms:description: A dataset that includes all 1,000 categories from ILSVRC2012 as base categories and 360 novel categories from ILSVRC2010, which are not overlapped with the base categories.
dcterms:title: ImageNet 2012/2010
